articles.title: A 'febrile' atmosphere - is football fan violence on rise?
articles.description: As a report shows more arrests were made at football matches last year than the year before, BBC Sport hears from football fans about their experiences of attending matches.
articles.content:
Manchester City were one of several clubs who were punished for pitch invasions last season
The father of a 15-year-old girl who was injured at a Carabao Cup match said behaviour of fans at football… [+8720 chars]

articles.title: Benjamin Mendy found not guilty of six counts of rape
articles.description: The Manchester City footballer was accused of luring women to his home and sexually assaulting them.
articles.content:
Manchester City footballer Benjamin Mendy has been found not guilty of six counts of rape and one count of sexual assault at Chester Crown Court.
Jurors could not reach verdicts on one count of rape… [+1003 chars]

articles.title: College football coaches make seven predictions for 2023
articles.description: Coaches open up about what to expect across the college football landscape in 2023.
articles.content:
There's a natural inclination to always look ahead in college football, especially at a time when the movement of players and coaches is fast and furious.

articles.author: Paul Collins
articles.title: Every clash I had with George Pell made me wish I had the umpire’s whistle
articles.description: I first met Pell on the football field in the early 1960s. He was a ruckman – a good footballer, but very rough – and I was the umpire. I awarded quite a few free kicks against him.
